description: A playful take on Brazil's mild winter, where the sun's warmth never truly leaves.
title: Shy Winter
n_1: On a Brazilian beach in mid-July, Lucas jokes with Mariana about the 'cold'.
c1_1: Can you feel the chill of winter? You might need to put on a second sunscreen layer!
c2_1: Oh, indeed! I almost wore long sleeves today!
n_2: They share a laugh, enjoying the gentle winter sun in their beach attire.
c1_2: Our winters are like shy sunbathers, barely making an appearance.
c2_2: True, it's the only winter where you can still get a tan.
n_3: As they set up their beach umbrella, the mild winter sun bathes them in warmth.
c1_3: Who needs a winter coat when you have the Brazilian sun?
c2_3: Just don't forget your sunglasses and hat!
n_4: They spend the day basking in the 'winter' sun, the beach their perfect winter getaway.
c1_4: Brazilian winter, the best of both worlds!
c2_4: Absolutely, where winter and summer vacations are the same.
